name: Thornesol
description:
It's summer and the sun is shining hard.
Kopoko's Vegetables are growing weaker and weaker
from the harsh assault by the elements...
You are such a great person
So take possession of Kopoko's body and use it
to water his plants.
Help your best bro Kopoko keep his garden alive!

https://github.com/Grongg/PEANUTBUTTERJAM2
